job_tasks.phrase: Design, build, test, deploy and run high quality and highly scalable GenAI solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the creation and operationalization of GenAI solutions, which involves model development and deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: comfortable building all components of our next-level GenAI solutions as a full-stack software engineer
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the need for full-stack software engineering skills to build the components of GenAI solutions, aligning with software development responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: design, build and run groundbreaking GenAI solutions
job_tasks.justification: The terms 'design', 'build', and 'run' are fundamental to software development, especially in the context of creating and operating solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: As a Full Stack Engineer you will join a multi-disciplinary team where you will have end-to-end responsible for your solutions.
job_tasks.justification: Being a 'Full Stack Engineer' and having 'end-to-end responsibility' for solutions clearly falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Work directly with (internal) customers to learn how processes and systems work.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding customer needs and existing business processes to inform the development of solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and build responsible and cost effective GenAI solutions for millions of customers.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the design and build aspects of creating GenAI solutions for a large customer base, which is a software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Convert these generic parts to re-usable building blocks used by 1000+ tech teams.
job_tasks.justification: Creating reusable components and building blocks is a core software engineering practice.

job_tasks.phrase: Pair-program with team members to solve critical or complex problems.
job_tasks.justification: Pair programming is a collaborative software development practice aimed at problem-solving.

job_tasks.phrase: deploy and run high quality and highly scalable GenAI solutions.
job_tasks.justification: The terms 'deploy' and 'run' in the context of solutions point to operational aspects, including scalability and quality.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to the relentless automation of the above activities.
job_tasks.justification: Automation of development, testing, deployment, and running activities is a key aspect of MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Give and receive help from peers, experts and stakeholders so we can improve together.
learn how processes and systems work.

soft_skills.phrase: Give and receive help from peers, experts and stakeholders so we can improve together.
learn how processes and systems work.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building and running 'GenAI solutions' as a full-stack software engineer. It highlights responsibilities such as designing, building, and deploying these solutions, along with concepts like re-usable building blocks and automation, aligning directly with the definition of a GenAI Engineer focused on user-facing software systems.
